name: NSAccessibilityNavigableStaticText
desc: A role-based protocol that declares the minimum interface necessary for an accessibility element to act as navigable static text.

items.name: func accessibilityFrame(for: NSRange) -> NSRect
items.desc: Returns the rectangle that encloses the specified range of characters.

items.name: func accessibilityLine(for: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the line number for the line that contains the specified character index.

items.name: func accessibilityRange(forLine: Int) -> NSRange
items.desc: Returns the range of characters in the specified line.

items.name: func accessibilityString(for: NSRange) -> String?
items.desc: Returns the substring for the specified range.
